title: General Training Set 1 — Lost Luggage & Athlete Salaries
description: Formal complaint letter about lost luggage and an opinion essay on professional athletes' salaries.

task1.title: Letter about lost luggage
task1.prompt: You recently flew with an international airline and your suitcase was lost. Write a letter to the airline. In your letter: explain what happened, describe the contents of your suitcase, and say what you would like the airline to do.
hints: Use a formal tone because you are writing to a company.
Include specific details about your flight and the missing items.
Clearly state what action you expect from the airline.

task2.title: Opinion essay — Athlete salaries
task2.prompt: Some people believe professional athletes are paid far too much money. Others think their income is justified. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
outline: Introduction: paraphrase the statement and state your position.
Body paragraph 1: reasons why athlete salaries may be considered excessive.
Body paragraph 2: arguments supporting high earnings for athletes.
Conclusion: give your opinion and suggest a balanced perspective.
